actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept additional land for the Pecos National Monument in the State of New Mexico.

summary.text: Increases the amount of land which the Secretary of the Interior is authorized to accept on behalf of the United States for the Pecos National Monument, New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept additional land for the Pecos National Monument in the State of New Mexico.
